Ex1: 假如下雨的话， 我们还是要去
Pinyin1: Jiǎrú xiàyǔ dehuà, wǒmen háishì yào qù.
Trans1: [Supposing] it rained, we would still go.
Ex2: 假如我是你的话，我会再等一会儿
Pinyin2: Jiǎrú wǒ shì nǐ dehuà, wǒ huì zài děng yīhuǐ'er.
Trans2: If I were you, I would wait a little longer.

Ex1: 6除以2等于3
Pinyin1: 6 chú yǐ 2 děngyú 3.
Trans1: 6 divided by 2 equals 3.
Ex2: 五加四等于九
Pinyin2: Wǔ jiā sì děngyú jiǔ.
Trans2: Five and four is nine.

Definition: to extend credit to; provide a loan
Ex1: 他靠一笔银行贷款做起了生意
Pinyin1: Tā kào yī bǐ yínháng dàikuǎn zuò qǐle shēngyì.
Trans1: A bank loan helped to set him up in business.
Ex2: 你可以在三年内分期归还贷款
Pinyin2: Nǐ kěyǐ zài sān nián nèi fēnqí guīhuán dàikuǎn.
Trans2: You can pay back the loan over a period of three years.

Ex1: 婴儿没有是非概念
Pinyin1: Yīng'ér méiyǒu shìfēi gàiniàn.
Trans1: A small baby has no concept of right and wrong.
Ex2: 认为另有一个平行宇宙的概念是很难理解的
Pinyin2: Rènwéi lìng yǒu yígè píngxíng yǔzhòu de gàiniàn shì hěn nán lǐjiě de.
Trans2: The idea of a parallel universe is hard to grasp.

Ex1: 因天气恶劣，所有航班都被取消
Pinyin1: Yīn tiānqì èliè, suǒyǒu hángbān dōu bèi qǔxiāo.
Trans1: All flights have been cancelled because of bad weather.
Ex2: 这是很恶劣的手段
Pinyin2: Zhè shì hěn èliè de shǒuduàn.
Trans2: This is a mean/dirty trick.

Ex1: 艺术并不只是关乎美或单纯的装饰品
Pinyin1: Yìshù bìng bù zhǐshì guānhū měi huò dānchún de zhuāngshìpǐn.
Trans1: Art is not all about beauty or simple decoration.
Ex2: 像孩子一样单纯
Pinyin2: Xiàng háizi yíyàng dānchún.
Trans2: As innocent as a child.

Ex1: 秋天是旅行的最好季节
Pinyin1: Qiūtiān shì lǚxíng de zuì hǎo jìjié.
Trans1: Autumn is the best season for travel.
Ex2: 当季节更替时，我身上的黝黑色消失了
Pinyin2: Dāng jìjié gēngtì shí, wǒ shēnshang de yǒuhēisè xiāoshīle.
Trans2: When the seasons changed, my tan faded.

Ex1: 有钱不见得提升你的快乐指数
Pinyin1: Yǒu qián bújiàndé tíshēng nǐ de kuàilè zhǐshù.
Trans1: Being rich does not necessarily increase your happiness index.
Ex2: 现代艺术不见得适合每个人的口味
Pinyin2: Xiàndài yìshù bújiàndé shìhé měi gèrén de kǒuwèi.
Trans2: Modern art does not necessarily suit everyone's taste.

Ex1: 城里到处都响起炸弹的爆炸声
Pinyin1: Chéng lǐ dàochrù dōu xiǎngqǐ zhàdàn de bàozhàshēng.
Trans1: Bomb explosions sounded everywhere in the city.
Ex2: 英语教材和词典到处都有出售
Pinyin2: Yīngyǔ jiàocái hé cídiǎn dàochù dōu yǒu chūshòu.
Trans2: English textbooks and dictionaries are on sale everywhere.

Ex1: 蝴蝶的飞翔力强
Pinyin1: Húdié de fēixiánglì qiáng.
Trans1: Butterflies have strong flying power.
Ex2: 毛虫变成蝴蝶
Pinyin2: Máochóng biànchéng húdié.
Trans2: Caterpillars change into butterflies.

Ex1: 点心夹子
Pinyin1: Diǎnxīn jiázi.
Trans1: Cake tongs.
Ex2: 这个袋子是旧的，用订书钉和夹子封住了
Pinyin2: Zhège dàizi shì jiù de, yòng dìng shū dīng hé jiázi fēng zhùle.
Trans2: This bag is old and sealed with staples and clips.

Ex1: 冷静一点！
Pinyin1: Lěngjìng yīdiǎn!
Trans1: Calm down!
Ex2: 试着保持冷静，告诉我发生了什么
Pinyin2: Shìzhe bǎochí lěngjìng, gàosù wǒ fāshēngle shénme.
Trans2: Try to keep calm and just tell me what happened.

Ex1: 这些结果能客观地衡量吗？
Pinyin1: Zhèxiē jiéguǒ néng kèguān de héngliáng ma?
Trans1: Can these effects be objectively measured?
Ex2: 只要涉及他，我就难以做到保持客观
Pinyin2: Zhǐyào shèjí tā, wǒ jiù nányǐ zuò dào bǎochí kèguān.
Trans2: As long as he is involved, it is difficult for me to remain objective.

Ex1: 你可以改正我的语法吗?
Pinyin1: Nǐ kěyǐ gǎizhèng wǒ de yǔfǎ ma?
Trans1: Can you correct my grammar?
Ex2: 有一些程序错误需要改正
Pinyin2: Yǒu yīxiē chéngxù cuòwù xūyào gǎizhèng.
Trans2: There are some programming errors that need correction.

Ex1: 你可以解释一下怎么用这个词吗？
Pinyin1: Nǐ kěyǐ jiěshì yīxià zěnme yòng zhège cí ma?
Trans1: Can you explain how to use this word?
Ex2: 他解释了所有的可能性
Pinyin2: Tā jiěshìle suǒyǒu de kěnéng xìng.
Trans2: He explained all the possibilities.

Ex1: 你可以借给我你的充电器吗
Pinyin1: Nǐ kěyǐ jiè gěi wǒ nǐ de chōngdiàn qì ma
Trans1: Can you lend me your charger?
Ex2: 他忘了带手机充电器
Pinyin2: Tā wàngle dài shǒujī chōngdiànqì.
Trans2: He forgot the charger for his phone.

Ex1: 中国还在发展当中
Pinyin1: Zhōngguó hái zài fāzhǎn dāngzhōng
Trans1: China is still developing.
Ex2: 我们需要发展地方工业
Pinyin2: Wǒmen xūyào fāzhǎn dìfāng gōngyè.
Trans2: We need to develop local industries.

Ex1: 中国应当对人类作出较大贡献
Pinyin1: Zhōngguó yīngdāng duì rénlèi zuòchū jiào dà gòngxiàn.
Trans1: China ought to make a greater contribution to humanity.
Ex2: 他决心把毕生精力贡献给科学事业
Pinyin2: Tā juéxīn bǎ bìshēng jīnglì gòngxiàn gěi kēxué shìyè.
Trans2: He is determined to devote his life energy to science.

Ex1: 服饰是一种基本的自我表现形式
Pinyin1: Fúshì shì yī zhǒng jīběn de zìwǒ biǎoxiàn xíngshì.
Trans1: Clothes are a fundamental form of self-expression.
Ex2: 基本的计算机技能
Pinyin2: Jīběn de jìsuànjī jìnéng.
Trans2: Basic computer skills.

Ex1: 煤炭实际上比煤气便宜
Pinyin1: Méitàn shíjì shang bǐ méiqì piányí.
Trans1: Coal is actually cheaper than gas.
Ex2: 炽热的煤炭在炉子里发光
Pinyin2: Chìrè de méitàn zài lúzǐ lǐ fāguāng.
Trans2: Hot coals glowed in the stove.

Ex1: 与美国等发达国家相比，农业生产率仍很低
Pinyin1: Yǔ měiguó děng fādá guójiā xiāng bǐ, nóngyè shēngchǎnlǜ réng hěn dī.
Trans1: Compared with developed countries such as the United States, agricultural productivity is still very low.
Ex2: 对于发达国家的人来说，心脏病是最致命的杀手
Pinyin2: Duìyú fādá guójiā de rén lái shuō, xīnzàng bìng shì zuì zhìmìng de shāshǒu.
Trans2: Heart disease is the biggest killer of men in developed countries.

Ex1: 妥协是生活不可避免的一部分
Pinyin1: Tuǒxié shì shēnghuó bùkě bìmiǎn de yībùfèn.
Trans1: Compromise is an inevitable part of life.
Ex2: 我想避免这种问题
Pinyin2: Wǒ xiǎng bìmiǎn zhè zhǒng wèntí.
Trans2: I want to avoid these kinds of problems.

Ex1: 棉花需要大量的水
Pinyin1: Miánhuā xūyào dàliàng de shuǐ.
Trans1: Cotton needs a lot of water.
Ex2: 女人穿彩色棉花衣服和头巾
Pinyin2: Nǚrén chuān cǎisè miánhuā yīfú hé tóujīn.
Trans2: Women wear colorful cotton dresses and headscarves.

Ex1: 你可不可以把最新的版本传真给我？
Pinyin1: Nǐ kěbù kěyǐ bǎ zuìxīn de bǎnběn chuánzhēn gěi wǒ?
Trans1: Could you fax me the latest version?
Ex2: 现在还有人使用传真机吗？
Pinyin2: Xiànzài hái yǒurén shǐyòng chuánzhēnjī ma?
Trans2: Is anyone still using a fax machine?

Ex1: 尽管她有困难，她照样继续工作
Pinyin1: Jǐnguǎn tā yǒu kùnnán, tā zhàoyàng jìxù gōngzuò.
Trans1: Despite her problems, she carried on working as usual.
Ex2: 尽管有飓风警报，人们仍然在大海里游泳
Pinyin2: Jǐnguǎn yǒu jùfēng jǐngbào, rénmen réngrán zài dàhǎi lǐ yóuyǒng.
Trans2: People were swimming in the ocean despite the hurricane warning.

Ex1: 朝代不同，眉毛的式样也不同
Pinyin1: Cháodài bùtóng, méimáo de shìyàng yě bùtóng.
Trans1: different dynasties have different styles of eyebrows.
Ex2: 西安，在中华民族发展史上，占有相当重要的位置，曾是十三个朝代的都城
Pinyin2: Xī'ān, zài zhōnghuá mínzú fāzhǎn shǐshàng, zhànyǒu xiāngdāng zhòngyào de wèizhì, céng shì shísān gè cháodài de dūchéng.
Trans2: Xi 'an, with an important historical position in Chinese history had been a capital of thirteen dynasties.

Ex1: 你们打折吗？
Pinyin1: Nǐmen dǎzhé ma?
Trans1: Do you give any discounts?
Ex2: 他们目下正在打折卖啤酒
Pinyin2: Tāmen mùxià zhèngzài dǎzhé mài píjiǔ.
Trans2: They have an offer on beer at the moment.

Ex1: 你有零钱吗？
Pinyin1: Nǐ yǒu língqián ma?
Trans1: Do you have any small change?
Ex2: 他把身上的零钱放进了给孩子的钱箱
Pinyin2: Tā bǎ shēnshang de língqián fàng jìnle gěi háizi de qián xiāng.
Trans2: He puts his loose change in a money box for the children.

Ex1: 要不要我帮你处理那些发票？
Pinyin1: Yào bù yào wǒ bāng nǐ chǔlǐ nàxiē fāpiào?
Trans1: Do you need a hand with those invoices?
Ex2: 发票准备好了吗?
Pinyin2: Fāpiào zhǔnbèi hǎole ma?
Trans2: Is the invoice ready?

Ex1: 你这封信要不要挂号？
Pinyin1: Nǐ zhè fēng xìn yào bùyào guàhào?
Trans1: Do you want to have this letter registered?
Ex2: 请排队挂号
Pinyin2: Qǐng páiduì guàhào.
Trans2: Please queue up to register.

Ex1: 这汽车经过北海公园吗?
Pinyin1: Zhè qìchē jīngguò běihǎi gōngyuán ma?
Trans1: Does the bus pass the Beihai Park?
Ex2: 她从这儿经过时没有一次不停下来问候一番
Pinyin2: Tā cóng zhè'er jīngguò shí méiyǒu yīcì bù tíng xiàlái wènhòu yī fān.
Trans2: She never passes without stopping to say hello.

Ex1: 不要灰心!
Pinyin1: Bùyào huīxīn!
Trans1: Don't be discouraged!
Ex2: 即使失败10次，我也不灰心
Pinyin2: Jíshǐ shībài 10 cì, wǒ yě bù huīxīn.
Trans2: I'll never lose heart even if I should fail ten times.

Ex1: 不要在晚餐前吃太多的零食
Pinyin1: Bùyào zài wǎncān qián chī tài duō de língshí.
Trans1: Don't eat too many snacks before dinner.
Ex2: 你不应该在两餐之间吃零食
Pinyin2: Nǐ bù yìnggāi zài liǎng cān zhījiān chī língshí.
Trans2: You shouldn't snack between meals.

Ex1: 不要用这样抽象的术语来说
Pinyin1: Bùyào yòng zhèyàng chōuxiàng de shùyǔ lái shuō.
Trans1: Don't speak in such abstract terms.
Ex2: 我不喜欢抽象艺术
Pinyin2: Wǒ bù xǐhuān chōuxiàng yìshù.
Trans2: I don't like abstract art.

Ex1: 别胡说!
Pinyin1: Bié húshuō!
Trans1: Don't talk nonsense!
Ex2: 那纯粹是胡说
Pinyin2: Nà chúncuì shì húshuō.
Trans2: That was pure nonsense.

Definition: to make light of, to despise, to underestimate
Ex1: 不要轻视理论的作用
Pinyin1: Bùyào qīngshì lǐlùn de zuòyòng.
Trans1: Don't underestimate the role of theory.
Ex2: 他很轻视他的老板
Pinyin2: Tā hěn qīngshì tā de lǎobǎn.
Trans2: He despises his boss.

Ex1: 工程师对轨道进行了彻底检查
Pinyin1: Gōngchéngshī duì guǐdào jìnxíngle chèdǐ jiǎnchá.
Trans1: Engineers carried out a thorough inspection of the track.
Ex2: 这栋建筑物被大火彻底焚毁了
Pinyin2: Zhè dòng jiànzhúwù bèi dàhuǒ chèdǐ fénhuǐle.
Trans2: The building was completely destroyed by fire.

Ex1: 每个人有自己的缺点
Pinyin1: Měi gèrén yǒu zìjǐ de quēdiǎn.
Trans1: Every person has their own shortcoming.
Ex2: 我要克服我所有的缺点
Pinyin2: Wǒ yào kèfú wǒ suǒyǒu de quēdiǎn.
Trans2: I want to overcome all of my shortcomings.

Ex1: 每个人都关心自己国家的前途
Pinyin1: Měi gèrén dōu guānxīn zìjǐ guójiā de qiántú.
Trans1: Everybody is concerned about the future of his country.
Ex2: 你派人送花就说明你是多么关心
Pinyin2: Nǐ pài rén sòng huā jiù shuōmíng nǐ shì duōme guānxīn.
Trans2: Sending flowers is a measure of how much you care.

Ex1: 你的一言一行都体现你的个性
Pinyin1: Nǐ de yìyányìxíng dōu tǐxiàn nǐ de gèxìng.
Trans1: Everything you do or say is reflective of your personality.
Ex2: 这座城镇本身就充满了活力和个性
Pinyin2: Zhè zuò chéngzhèn běnshēn jiù chōngmǎnle huólì hé gèxìng.
Trans2: The town itself was full of life and character.

Ex1: 重要的是经验, 年龄是次要的
Pinyin1: Zhòngyào de shì jīngyàn, niánlíng shì cìyào de.
Trans1: Experience is what matters—age is of secondary importance.
Ex2: 那只不过是次要的因素
Pinyin2: Nà zhǐ bùguò shì cìyào de yīnsù.
Trans2: That is just a secondary consideration.

Ex1: 家庭结构正在弱化、崩溃
Pinyin1: Jiātíng jiégòu zhèngzài ruòhuà, bēngkuì.
Trans1: Family structures are weakening and breaking up.
Ex2: 这种结构一定很稳固
Pinyin2: Zhè zhǒng jiégòu yídìng hěn wěngù.
Trans2: This structure must be stable.

Ex1: 战争之后没几座完好的建筑了
Pinyin1: Zhànzhēng zhīhòu méi jǐ zuò wánhǎo de jiànzhúle.
Trans1: Few buildings survived the war intact.
Ex2: 这座建筑是用于宗教活动的
Pinyin2: Zhè zuò jiànzhú shì yòngyú zōngjiào huódòng de.
Trans2: The building is used for religious purposes.

Ex1: 你幸好及时发现了险情
Pinyin1: Nǐ xìnghǎo jíshí fāxiànle xiǎnqíng.
Trans1: Fortunately, you discovered the danger in time.
Ex2: 不可能及时到达那里
Pinyin2: Bù kěnéng jíshí dàodá nàlǐ.
Trans2: It's impossible to get there in time.

Ex1: 勤奋工作是成功的基础
Pinyin1: Qínfèn gōngzuò shì chénggōng de jīchǔ.
Trans1: Hard work is fundamental to success.
Ex2: 她工作勤奋，不久就得到提升了
Pinyin2: Tā gōngzuò qínfèn, bùjiǔ jiù dédào tíshēngle.
Trans2: She worked hard and was soon promoted.

Ex1: 他几乎杀了她
Pinyin1: Tā jīhū shāle tā.
Trans1: He almost killed her.
Ex2: 几乎整夜下着雨
Pinyin2: Jīhū zhěngyè xiàzhe yǔ.
Trans2: It rained almost all night.

Ex1: 他非常周密地分析了情况
Pinyin1: Tā fēicháng zhōumì de fēnxīle qíngkuàng.
Trans1: He analysed the situation very closely.
Ex2: 他们收集血样以在一个国家实验室做化验分析
Pinyin2: Tāmen shōují xuèyàng yǐ zài yígè guójiā shíyàn shì zuò huàyàn fēnxī.
Trans2: They collect blood samples for analysis at a national laboratory.

Ex1: 他和他的妻子经营他们自己的古董店
Pinyin1: Tā hé tā de qīzi jīngyíng tāmen zìjǐ de gǔdǒng diàn.
Trans1: He and his wife run their own antiques shop.
Ex2: 我无意告诉你如何经营你自己的事业
Pinyin2: Wǒ wúyì gàosù nǐ rúhé jīngyíng nǐ zìjǐ de shìyè.
Trans2: I have no intention to tell you how to run your own business.

Ex1: 他能听到她的呼吸不均匀
Pinyin1: Tā néng tīng dào tā de hūxī bù jūnyún.
Trans1: He could hear that her breathing was uneven.
Ex2: 今年的雨水很均匀
Pinyin2: Jīnnián de yǔshuǐ hěn jūnyún.
Trans2: Rainfall this year is very even.

Ex1: 他只能看见球门柱模糊的轮廓
Pinyin1: Tā zhǐ néng kànjiàn qiúménzhù móhú de lúnkuò.
Trans1: He could only see the vague outline of the goal post.
Ex2: 那天发生的事只剩一片模糊的记忆
Pinyin2: Nàtiān fāshēng de shì zhǐ shèng yípiàn móhú de jìyì.
Trans2: Only a vague memory of what happened that day remained.

Ex1: 他受不了他的工作，就辞职了
Pinyin1: Tā shòu bùliǎo tā de gōngzuò, jiù cízhíle.
Trans1: He couldn't stand his job so he resigned.
Ex2: 我们队长辞职了
Pinyin2: Wǒmen duìzhǎng cízhíle.
Trans2: The captain of our team has resigned.

Ex1: 他把那条面包切成了厚片
Pinyin1: Tā bǎ nà tiáo miànbāo qiè chéngle hòu piàn.
Trans1: He cut the loaf into thick slices.
Ex2: 这本书很厚！
Pinyin2: Zhè běn shū hěn hòu!
Trans2: This is a thick book!

Ex1: 他否认他们在一起
Pinyin1: Tā fǒurèn tāmen zài yīqǐ.
Trans1: He denied that they are together.
Ex2: 我的本能反应是否认一切
Pinyin2: Wǒ de běnnéng fǎnyìng shì fǒurèn yíqiè.
Trans2: My instinctive reaction was to deny everything.

Ex1: 他没有任何讽刺的意思
Pinyin1: Tā méiyǒu rènhé fèngcì de yìsi.
Trans1: He didn't intend any sarcasm.
Ex2: 具有讽刺意味的是，竟然有那么多妇女是反对女权主义的
Pinyin2: Jùyǒu fèngcì yìwèi de shì, jìngrán yǒu nàme duō fùnǚ shì fǎnduì nǚquán zhǔyì de.
Trans2: It is ironic that so many women are anti-feminist.

Ex1: 他不知道怎么表达心里的感觉
Pinyin1: Tā bù zhīdào zěnme biǎodá xīnlǐ de gǎnjué
Trans1: He doesn't know how to express his emotions.
Ex2: 写作是表达情感的一种好方法
Pinyin2: Xiězuò shì biǎodá qínggǎn de yī zhǒng hǎo fāngfǎ.
Trans2: Writing is a good tool for expressing feelings.

Ex1: 他根本不了解这件事
Pinyin1: Tā gēnběn bù liǎojiě zhè jiàn shì.
Trans1: He doesn't understand this at all.
Ex2: 我根本不同情你 - 这都怪你自己
Pinyin2: Wǒ gēnběn bù tóngqíng nǐ—zhè dōu guài nǐ zìjǐ.
Trans2: I don't sympathize with you at all - you are to blame.

Ex1: 他单独住一间屋子
Pinyin1: Tā dāndú zhù yī jiàn wūzi.
Trans1: He has a room to himself.

Ex1: 我只想在那里积累一些有用的经验
Pinyin1: Wǒ zhǐ xiǎng zài nàlǐ jīlěi yīxiē yǒuyòng de jīngyàn.

Pinyin1: Tā fēicháng jiēshi, shì yòng sān kuài hòu mùbǎn zuò chéng de.

Trans1: The air was full of the fragrance of flowers.
Ex2: 她总是充满活力
Pinyin2: Tā zǒng shì chōngmǎn huólì.
Trans2: She's always full of energy.

Ex1: 球滚下了山
Pinyin1: Qiú gǔnxiàle shān.
Trans1: The ball rolled down the hill.
Ex2: 硬币滚到了钢琴底下
Pinyin2: Yìngbì gǔndàole gāngqín dǐxia.
Trans2: The coin rolled underneath the piano.

Ex1: 本书继而描述了他在部队的经历
Pinyin1: Běn shū jì'ér miáoshùle tā zài bùduì de jīnglì.
Trans1: The book goes on to describe his experiences in the army.
Ex2: 看你的孩子出生是一次非常难忘的经历
Pinyin2: Kàn nǐ de háizi chūshēng shì yícì fēicháng nánwàng de jīnglì.
Trans2: It is a very unforgettable experience to watch your baby born.

Ex1: 这个书架被固定在墙壁上
Pinyin1: Zhège shūjià bèi gùdìng zài qiángbì shàng.
Trans1: The bookshelf is fastened to the wall.
Ex2: 很多餐馆提供固定价格的菜单
Pinyin2: Hěnduō cānguǎn tígōng gùdìng jiàgé de càidān.
Trans2: Many restaurants offer fixed-price menus.

Ex1: 这辆车是用我的名字登记的
Pinyin1: Zhè liàng chē shì yòng wǒ de míngzì dēngjì de.
Trans1: The car is registered in my name.

Pinyin2: Shù qiān rén páiduì dēngjì tóupiào.
Trans2: Thousands lined up to register to vote.

Ex1: 该中心对于广大公众来讲很便利
Pinyin1: Gāi zhōngxīn duìyú guǎngdà gōngzhòng lái jiǎng hěn biànlì.
Trans1: The centre is easily accessible to the general public.
Ex2: 他的书被搬上银幕后赢得了更广大的观众
Pinyin2: Tā de shū bèi bān shàng yínmù hòu yíngdéle gèng guǎngdà de guānzhòng.
Trans2: His book reached an even wider audience when it was made into a movie.

Ex1: 他申请的那所学院录取了他
Pinyin1: Tā shēnqǐng de nà suǒ xuéyuàn lùqǔle tā.
Trans1: The college he applied to has accepted him.
Ex2: 你被录取以后经历了什么过程？
Pinyin2: Nǐ bèi lùqǔ yǐhòu jīnglìle shénme guòchéng?
Trans2: What process did you go through after you were admitted?

Ex1: 这个公司开发并销售新软件
Pinyin1: Zhège gōngsī kāifā bìng xiāoshòu xīn ruǎnjiàn.
Trans1: The company develops and markets new software.
Ex2: 资金也会流入越南本地开发项目
Pinyin2: Zījīn yě huì liúrù yuènán běndì kāifā xiàngmù.
Trans2: Money will also go into local development projects in Vietnam.

Ex1: 点燃奥运圣火的风俗可追溯到几个世纪前
Pinyin1: Diǎnrán àoyùn shènghuǒ de fēngsú kě zhuīsù dào jǐ gè shìjì qián.
Trans1: The custom of lighting the Olympic flame goes back centuries.

Pinyin2: Tā jùjué zūncóng dāngdì de fēngsú xíguàn.
Trans2: He refused to conform to the local customs.

Ex1: 他做的菜都有一种个人的风格
Pinyin1: Tā zuò de cài dōu yǒu yī zhǒng gèrén de fēnggé.
Trans1: The dishes he produces all have a personal touch.

Pinyin2: Tā gèrén de cáichǎn gūjì wèi 1 yì yuán zuǒyòu.
Trans2: His personal wealth is estimated at around $100 million.

Ex1: 医生排掉了一些液体以缓解压力
Pinyin1: Yīshēng páidiàole yīxiē yètǐ yǐ huǎnjiě yālì.
Trans1: The doctor drained some fluid to relieve the pressure.
Ex2: 药物可以缓解疼痛
Pinyin2: Yàowù kěyǐ huǎnjiě téngtòng.
Trans2: Drugs can relieve much of the pain.

Ex1: 医生建议我多做点户外活动
Pinyin1: Yīshēng jiànyì wǒ duō zuò diǎn hùwài huódòng.
Trans1: The doctor suggested I should have more outdoor exercise.

Pinyin2: Wǒ jiànyì wǒmen tiào dào yìchéng de zuìhòu yī xiàng.
Trans2: I suggest we skip to the last item on the agenda.

Ex1: 那狗在啃骨头
Pinyin1: Nàgǒu zài kěn gútou.
Trans1: The dog was gnawing a bone.

Pinyin2: Rén de gǔgé yóu 206 kuài gǔtou zǔchéng.
Trans2: The human skeleton consists of 206 bones.

Ex1: 这次地震显示为里氏5.7级
Pinyin1: Zhè cì dìzhèn xiǎnshì wèi lǐshì 5.7 jí.
Trans1: The earthquake registered 5.7 on the Richter scale.

Pinyin2: Rìběn shícháng zāoshòu dìzhèn zhī kǔ.
Trans2: Japan often suffers from earthquakes.

Ex1: 电力工业消耗大量的矿物燃料
Pinyin1: Diànlì gōngyè xiāohào dàliàng de kuàngwù ránliào.
Trans1: The electricity industry consumes large amounts of fossil fuels.

Pinyin2: Bāsèluōnà shì xībānyá gōngyè de fǎyuándì.

Ex1: 这家公司的雇员们正期待着大笔的奖金
Pinyin1: Zhè jiā gōngsī de gùyuánmen zhèng qídàizhe dà bǐ de jiǎngjīn.
Trans1: The employees of this company are expecting large bonuses.

Pinyin2: Tāmen méi dédào niánzhōng jiǎngjīn.
Trans2: They didn't receive end of year bonuses.

Ex1: 目前汇率对我们有利
Pinyin1: Mùqián huìlǜ duì wǒmen yǒulì.
Trans1: The exchange rate is in our favour at the moment.

Pinyin2: Jīntiān de huìlǜ shì shénme?

Ex1: 这项练习将明显增强力量和耐力
Pinyin1: Zhè xiàng liànxí jiāng míngxiǎn zēngqiáng lìliàng hé nàilì.
Trans1: The exercise obviously will improve strength and endurance.
Ex2: 他一点力量都没有！
Pinyin2: Tā yīdiǎn lìliàng dōu méiyǒu!

Ex1: 姑娘们在操场上跳绳
Pinyin1: Gūniángmen zài cāochǎng shàng tiàoshéng.
Trans1: The girls were skipping in the playground.

Pinyin2: Cāochǎng shàng yǒu yígè shākēng, yī fù qiāoqiāobǎn hé yī jià qiūqiān.

Ex1: 政府发现自己遭到了强烈的反对
Pinyin1: Zhèngfǔ fāxiàn zìjǐ zāo dàole qiángliè de fǎnduì.
Trans1: The government found itself confronted by massive opposition.
Ex2: 我反对！
Pinyin2: Wǒ fǎnduì!
Trans2: I oppose!

Ex1: 这冰承受不了你的体重
Pinyin1: Zhè bīng chéngshòu bùliǎo nǐ de tǐzhòng.
Trans1: The ice will not sustain your weight.

Pinyin2: Zhídào nà shí tā cái yìshí dào tā suǒ chéngshòu de yālì.

Ex1: 这昆虫的翅膀几乎是透明的
Pinyin1: Zhè kūnchóng de chìbǎng jīhū shì tòumíng de.
Trans1: The insect's wings are almost transparent.
Ex2: 那只鸟收起了翅膀
Pinyin2: Nà zhī niǎo shōu qǐle chìbǎng.
Trans2: The bird folded its wings.

Ex1: 暴力的程度令人震惊

Ex1: 90%的股东出席了会议

Trans1: The meeting was attended by 90% of shareholders.

Ex1: 月亮在瀑布溅起的水雾中映出了一道彩虹

Ex1: 新政府面临的第一项挑战是经济

Pinyin2: Guójiā jīngjì zhèngzài huǎnmàn dàn wěnbù de zēngzhǎng.

Pinyin1: Zhè bù xiǎoshuō shì gēnjù zhēnshí de gùshì xiěchéng de.

Ex1: 桃子成熟了

Ex1: 这张照片是从不寻常的角度拍摄的

Ex1: 池子里满是淤泥和绿色的污水

Ex1: 这个问题不过是你的想象
Pinyin1: Zhège wèntí bùguò shì nǐ de xiǎngxiàng.

Definition: to express, to mean, to plead (court)
Ex1: 红色信号灯表示人和车辆不能通行
Pinyin1: Hóngsè xìnhàodēng biǎoshì rén hé chēliàng bùnéng tōngxíng.

Ex1: 这个房间面积是12平方米
Pinyin1: Zhège fángjiān miànjī shì 12 píngfāng mǐ.

Ex1: 这酱汁太淡了

Ex1: 那位教师无法维持课堂纪律

Ex1: 教育的价值

Ex1: 村子本身很美，但周围的田野相当单调
Pinyin1: Cūnzi běnshēn hěn měi, dàn zhōuwéi de tiányě xiāngdāng dāndiào.

Ex1: 他们的行动清楚地反映了他们的思想
Pinyin1: Tāmen de xíngdòng qīngchǔ dì fǎnyìngle tāmen de sīxiǎng.

Ex1: 他们的文化背景赋予了他们一种冒险精神
Pinyin1: Tāmen de wénhuà bèijǐng fùyǔle tāmen yī zhǒng màoxiǎn jīngshén.

Ex1: 他们的思维方式很落后

Ex1: 明年价格必然会上涨
Pinyin1: Míngnián jiàgé bìrán huì shàngzhǎng.

Ex2: 这是发展的必然后果

Ex1: 这里有很多工厂
Pinyin1: Zhèlǐ yǒu hěnduō gōngchǎng.

Ex2: 这家工厂已登记在案，准备拆除

Ex1: 这两组数据相互矛盾

Ex1: 这件事不必辩论了

Ex1: 不必如此小心谨慎

Ex1: 有一段令人尴尬的长时间的沉默
Pinyin1: Yǒu yīduàn lìng rén gāngà de cháng shíjiān de chénmò.

Pinyin2: Tā chénmòle yíhuì yòu jìxù shuō xiàqù.

Ex1: 好了，好了！不要紧，你很快就会感到好一些了
Pinyin1: Hǎole, hǎole! Bùyàojǐn, nǐ hěn kuài jiù huì gǎndào hǎo yīxiēle.

Ex1: 她说的还是有些道理的
Pinyin1: Tā shuō de háishì yǒuxiē dàolǐ de.

Trans2: I can't get her to listen to reason.

Ex1: 这是进口产品
Pinyin1: Zhè shì jìnkǒu chǎnpǐn.
Trans1: These are imported goods.
Ex2: 政府推出了15%的进口附加费

Ex1: 这是个别情况

Pinyin2: Wǒmen wéi suǒyǒu gùkè tígōng gèbié fúwù.

Ex1: 这些故事令我吃惊，并且感动了我
Pinyin1: Zhèxiē gùshì lìng wǒ chījīng, bìngqiě gǎndòngle wǒ.

Pinyin2: Tāmen jiào wǒ zhànzhe bù dòng bìngqiě bùyào zhuǎnshēn.

Ex1: 他们劝她先躲藏一下
Pinyin1: Tāmen quàn tā xiān duǒcáng yīxià.
Trans1: They advised her to go into hiding for a while.

Pinyin2: Wǒ duǒ zài yī kē shù hòumiàn.

Ex1: 他们希望重复去年的胜利
Pinyin1: Tāmen xīwàng chóngfù qùnián de shènglì.

Pinyin2: Tāmen dédào yígè fǒudìng de dáfù.
Trans2: They received a negative reply.

Ex1: 我们为什么应该雇佣你呢？
Pinyin1: Wǒmen wèishéme yīnggāi gùyōng nǐ ne?
Trans1: Why should we hire you?
Ex2: 他被他们雇佣了18年
Pinyin2: Tā bèi tāmen gùyōngle 18 nián.
Trans2: He was employed by them for eighteen years.

Ex1: 公司会覆盖所有的费用吗
Pinyin1: Gōngsī huì fùgài suǒyǒu de fèiyòng ma?
Trans1: Will the company cover all costs?
Ex2: 我以为他们同意支付我的费用
Pinyin2: Wǒ yǐwéi tāmen tóngyì zhīfù wǒ de fèiyòng.
Trans2: I thought they would pay my expenses.

Ex1: 妇女只是要求得到和男人平等的地位
Pinyin1: Fùnǚ zhǐshì yāoqiú dédào hé nánrén píngděng dì dìwèi.
Trans1: Women are only asking to be given equal status with men.
Ex2: 追逐地位的欲望可以成为强大的动力
Pinyin2: Zhuīzhú dìwèi de yùwàng kěyǐ chéngwéi qiángdà de dònglì.
Trans2: Desire for status can be a powerful motivator.

Ex1: 木头不是良好的导体
Pinyin1: Mùtou bùshì liánghǎo de dǎotǐ.
Trans1: Wood is a poor conductor.
Ex2: 他们的盘子是用木头制成的
Pinyin2: Tāmen de pánzi shì yòng mùtou zhìchéng de.
Trans2: Their plates are made of wood.

Ex1: 你不能放弃！
Pinyin1: Nǐ bùnéng fàngqì!
Trans1: You can't give up!
Ex2: 不要放弃，你的前面还有一辈子呢
Pinyin2: Bùyào fàngqì, nǐ de qiánmiàn hái yǒu yībèizi ne.
Trans2: Don't give up, you still have your whole life in front of you.

Ex1: 你不能这样对待别人
Pinyin1: Nǐ bùnéng zhèyàng duìdài biérén.
Trans1: You can't treat people like this.
Ex2: 你这样对待自己的女儿应该感到羞愧
Pinyin2: Nǐ zhèyàng duìdài zìjǐ de nǚ'ér yīnggāi gǎndào xiūkuì.
Trans2: You should be ashamed of treating your daughter like that.

Ex1: 不要为这事发愁
Pinyin1: Nǐ bùyào wèi zhè shì fāchóu.
Trans1: You don't need to worry about it.
Ex2: 他总是为自己的体重发愁
Pinyin2: Tā zǒngshì wèi zìjǐ de tǐzhòng fāchóu.
Trans2: He's always worrying about his weight.

Ex1: 要积极一点！
Pinyin1: Yào jījí yīdiǎn!
Trans1: You have to be more positive!
Ex2: 我选择了一种积极的人生观
Pinyin2: Wǒ xuǎnzéle yī zhǒng jījí de rénshēng guān.
Trans2: I adopted a positive outlook on life.

Ex1: 上班时得系领带
Pinyin1: Shàngbān shí dé xì lǐngdài
Trans1: You have to wear a tie at work.
Ex2: 我不喜欢系领带
Pinyin2: Wǒ bù xǐhuān xì lǐngdài.
Trans2: I don't like wearing a tie.

Ex1: 你必须遵守公司的规定
Pinyin1: Nǐ bìxū zūnshǒu gōngsī de guīdìng.
Trans1: You must follow the rules of the company.
Ex2: 政府给整个工业规定了质量标准
Pinyin2: Zhèngfǔ gěi zhěnggè gōngyè guīdìngle zhìliàng biāozhǔn.
Trans2: The government set quality standards for the entire industry.

Ex1: 你不能只看事情的表面
Pinyin1: Nǐ bùnéng zhǐ kàn shìqíng de biǎomiàn.
Trans1: You must not look only at the surface of things.
Ex2: 水蒸发后，土壤表面留下一层盐
Pinyin2: Shuǐ zhēngfā hòu, tǔrǎng biǎomiàn liú xià yī céng yán.
Trans2: As the water evaporates, a crust of salt is left on the surface of the soil.

Ex1: 你必须支付利息
Pinyin1: Nǐ bìxū zhīfù lìxí.
Trans1: You must pay interest.
Ex2: 这笔钱的利息是免税的
Pinyin2: Zhè bǐ qián de lìxí shì miǎnshuì de.
Trans2: The interest on the money is exempt from tax.

Ex1: 切割金属需要用功率大的锯
Pinyin1: Qiēgē jīnshǔ xūyào yòng gōnglǜ dà de jù.
Trans1: You need a powerful saw to cut through metal.
Ex2: 他从帆布袋里拿出了一个金属水瓶
Pinyin2: Tā cóng fānbùdài lǐ ná chūle yígè jīnshǔ shuǐpíng.
Trans2: He took out a metal flask from a canvas bag.

Definition: to the greatest extent, as far as possible
Ex1: 你应该尽量更有效地分配你的时间
Pinyin1: Nǐ yīnggāi jǐnliàng gèng yǒuxiào de fēnpèi nǐ de shíjiān.
Trans1: You should try and organize your time better.
Ex2: 你要尽量不让肌肉和关节太吃力
Pinyin2: Nǐ yào jǐnliàng bù ràng jīròu hé guānjié tài chīlì.
Trans2: You should try not to place too much strain on muscles and joints.

Ex1: 你应该把锻炼和健康饮食结合起来
Pinyin1: Nǐ yīnggāi bǎ duànliàn hé jiànkāng yǐnshí jiéhé qǐlái.
Trans1: You should try to combine exercise with a healthy diet.
Ex2: 这位艺术家在同一幅画中把不同的画法结合在一起
Pinyin2: Zhè wèi yìshùjiā zài tóngyī fú huà zhōng bǎ bùtóng de huàfǎ jiéhé zài yīqǐ.
Trans2: This artist combines different techniques in the same painting.

Ex1: 要是让我抓着你，你会后悔的！
Pinyin1: Yàoshi ràng wǒ zhuāzhe nǐ, nǐ huì hòuhuǐ de!
Trans1: You'll be sorry if I catch you!
Ex2: 我真的很后悔
Pinyin2: Wǒ zhēn de hěn hòuhuǐ.
Trans2: I really regret it.

Ex1: 你对他要求过分了
Pinyin1: Nǐ duì tā yāoqiú guòfènle.
Trans1: You're asking too much of him.
Ex2: 他一只很粗鲁，但这次太过分了
Pinyin2: Tā yī zhǐ hěn cūlǔ, dàn zhè cì tài guòfènle.
Trans2: He's always been quite rude, but this time he's gone too far.

Ex1: 你在耽误每个人
Pinyin1: Nǐ zài dānwù měi gèrén.
Trans1: You're holding everyone up.
Ex2: 他把耽误的时间夺回来
Pinyin2: Tā bǎ dānwù de shíjiān duó huílái.
Trans2: He made up for lost time.

Ex1: 雪地上骑车要格外小心
Pinyin1: Xuě dìshàng qíchē yào géwài xiǎoxīn.
Trans1: You've got to be especially careful when you cycle on snow.
Ex2: 你要格外小心，别犯错误
Pinyin2: Nǐ yào géwài xiǎoxīn, bié fàn cuòwù.
Trans2: You need to be extra careful not to make any mistakes.
